reviewText: I would recommend all teachers of middle and high school students get this video.  There is so much to know and learn.  The workmanship of the footage is awesome.  The video is clear, well-made and provides much knowledge to anyone who would take time to view it.

New to SCUBA so everyting related I've been gobbling up. Came across the "Deep Sea Detectives" and loved the show... too bad it ended. I guess I'll be buying more of this series on DVD. This particular story is absolutely fascinating. They did society a service with this presentaion.
